data.title: 2024 Formula 1 schedule: Dates for record-high 24 races in 2024
data.meta_description: The Formula 1 grid will compete at a record-high 24 races in the 2024 season. Here's the schedule for each race weekend.
data.text:
The Formula 1 season is here. After three months away, the 10 teams and 20 drivers return to the track for the first event of the season. The Bahrain Grand Prix is the first of a record 24 races this year.

Three-time defending champion Max Verstappen and Red Bull Racing were nearly unstoppable in 2023. The driver-team combination set multiple Formula 1 records in one of the most dominant campaigns in the sport's history. The other nine teams will be gunning to close the gap in 2024, starting in the first weekend of March.

Here's the full schedule for the 2024 Formula 1 season:

2024 Formula 1 season schedule
